response.answer_text: I always wondered the answer for this question and recently during my visit to Kolli hills learnt that he was born in that region. The claim that he was born in the kolli hills has been consistent among the locals there and the internet also has a lot of articles on the same going far back to the 90’s. Kolli Hills - Wikipedia This claim is also backed by jain text/account although not explicitly stating the region, but it does say that he was from the south. Chanakya - Wikipedia
According to some historians, he was born near Kochi, Kerala

Chanakya was born in ancient India in 350 BC There is still a dispute about their birthplace. Some people believe that they were born in Taxila and some people believe that they were born in South India.  Here we give some interesting fact about Chanakya…
Historians based on References concluded that Chanakya’s birth place could either be Takshashila or Charsadda(Pushkalavati) i.e., present day Peshawar.
